import React, {useEffect, useState, ChangeEvent} from 'react' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import {FiArrowLeft} from 'react-icons/fi' import { MapContainer, Marker, TileLayer } from "react-leaflet" import api from '../../services/api' import './style.css' import logo from '../../assets/logo.svg' import axios from 'axios' interface Item { id: number; title: string; image_url: string; } interface IBGEUFResponse { sigla: string } const CreatePoint = () => { const [items, setItems] = useState([]) const [ufs, setUfs] = useState([]) const [selectedUf, setSelectedUf] = useState('0') useEffect(() => { api.get('items').then(response => { setItems(response.data) } ) }, []); useEffect(() =>{ axios.get('https://servicodados.ibge.gov.br/api/v1/localidades/estados').then(response =>{ const ufInitials = response.data.map(uf => uf.sigla) setUfs(ufInitials) }) }, []) function handSelectUf(event: ChangeEvent){ const uf = event.target.value setSelectedUf(uf) } return(
